backend/main.mo: Defines user profiles, access control, and extensive match-related types for multiple game modes with profile queries and save operations.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries mapping features to related frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides short descriptive summaries for various frontend source files across the app.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining theme variables and dark mode styles.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point loading the React app root and main script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes and wraps the app with theming, auth, layout, and notifications.
frontend/src/components/apa/ApaBallButto: Reusable button component for selecting ball outcomes with state-based styling.
frontend/src/components/apa/apaBallStyle: Provides helpers for 9‑ball scoring including ball values, state labels, and tallying rack totals.
frontend/src/components/apa/ApaRackScori: Interactive APA rack scoring UI handling ball states, innings flow, defensive shots, and rack completion logic.
frontend/src/components/apa/ApaResultsSu: Displays final APA match results, showing winner, match points, and detailed stats for both players.
frontend/src/components/apa/useApaInning: Manages inning flow state for APA play, tracking active player, innings, and ball-scoring transitions.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthGate.ts: Gates app access behind Internet Identity login, showing loading, login UI, or the protected content.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button that handles Internet Identity authentication and query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Prompts new authenticated users to enter their name and saves their profile.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: App shell with header, footer, routing outlet, login controls, and automatic profile setup dialog.
frontend/src/components/matches/DeleteMa: Button and confirmation dialog for deleting a match and navigating afterward.
frontend/src/components/matches/EndMatch: Dialog used to confirm ending and saving a match session.
frontend/src/components/matches/MatchSum: Displays a match summary card with mode, date, players, and mode‑specific scoring info.
frontend/src/components/navigation/ModeC: Card component for selecting a game mode and navigating to its start page.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, loading stored identities and exposing login/logout with AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Wraps backend actor calls in React Query hooks for user profiles and match CRUD operations.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and CSS variables for light/dark themes.
frontend/src/lib/apa/apaEqualizer.ts: Implements APA 9‑ball skill level utilities and points‑to‑win lookups.
frontend/src/lib/apa/apaMatchPoints.ts: Defines APA 9‑ball match point conversion charts and threshold structures.
frontend/src/lib/apa/apaScoring.ts: Provides APA rack scoring rules, PPI calculations, and player stats aggregation.
frontend/src/lib/matches/matchBuilders.t: Builds a complete APA 9‑ball practice match record with stats, PPI, and metadata.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/accepting-gifts/Accep: Runs the Accepting Gifts drill session with score and attempt tracking, rule display, and match-saving logic.
Displays rules and instructions for the Accepting Gifts drill inside a card component.
Start form for the Accepting Gifts drill where the user enters player info and initializes session state.
Manages an APA 9-ball practice match including rack scoring, PPI calculations, match completion, and saving results.
frontend/src/pages/apa/PracticeStartPage: Form for creating a new APA 9-ball practice match with player names, skill levels, and initial match state.
frontend/src/pages/history/MatchDetailsP: Displays saved match details including mode-specific data, metadata, and delete options.
frontend/src/pages/history/MatchHistoryP: Displays match history with filtering by mode and loads match summaries via MatchSummaryCard.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Landing page with navigation cards to start APA practice, Accepting Gifts, Straight Shot, and view match history.
frontend/src/pages/straight-shot/Straigh: Runs the Straight Shot drill game, tracking strokes and events, persisting state, and saving completed matches.
Shows rules and instructions for the Straight Shot strokes drill.
Start page for the Straight Shot drill allowing player setup and showing recent moving average stats.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters with sessionStorage support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending theme colors, fonts, animations, and enabling plugins.
project_state.json: Stores the app’s current project state including versioning, feature definitions, architectural notes for APA 9‑ball and practice modes, and known issues such as login persistence problems.
